```py
    >>> doc = pymupdf.open()
    >>> page = doc.new_page()
    >>> text = "PyMuPDF: the Python bindings for MuPDF"
    >>> font = pymupdf.Font("figo")  # choose a font with small caps
    >>> tw = pymupdf.TextWriter(page.rect)
    >>> tw.append((50,100), text, font=font, small_caps=True)
    >>> tw.write_text(page)
    >>> doc.ez_save("x.pdf") 
    ```
